nodes.text: The HyperMatter Pipeline Control Station was a control station in the Black Hole, a hypermatter refinery on the planet Corellia. During the Galactic War, the reconstituted Sith Empire raided the already-damaged facility to reroute the Black Hole's pipelines to replenish their own reserves.

The HyperMatter Pipeline Control Station is the site of the Imperial mission "Glow," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole.
